With the global pandemic, many teachers have been pushed to the online world. While the online world presents a large number of opportunities, it just isnâ€™t the same as what we were used to. It presents challenges, some of which Google Classroom Suite aims to make easier. Attendance taking has been made easier by automatically recording your students in Google Meet. This record is saved on a Google Sheet in a folder in your Google Drive. 

Get information on your assignments for respective courses easily, and be able to check your contacts at a glance. More features are on the way.

To find out more about the application and get in contact with us, please check this Classroom Forum Page
https://support.google.com/edu/classroom/thread/63015671?hl=en

Currently focusing on making it easier to share links as announcements or posts, create assignments and view student submissions, marks and attendance. Adding the ability to look at students scores, for a particular assignment. This will make it easier for you to focus on students, and see where they are falling behind. If you wish to suggest a feature or have something in mind that would improve the extension please click on the above link.
